column5: Hey guys/girls  I'm cleaning out my garage, getting rid of some equipment I no longer need or use. 2 Scotty downriggers complete except for the bases that bolt to your boat (short boom) 2 plastic tackle boxes 4 older fishing rods - suitable for a younster - Shakespear & Algonquin complete set of men's hockey equipment - older but at the time was top quality. CCM tack skates size 9 1/2, CCM gloves were $100.00 20 years ago, cooper pro shin pads, cooper pro elbow pads, cooper pants.  I'm 5' 11", 210 lbs.  This equipment is free to any one who would like to pick it up. I'm located in Fonthill near St. Catharines.  Please phone 905-988-8187
I will take the downriggers,  can I pickup on wed.
Thanx for your replies, phone calls & PMs.  The fishing equipment is gone.  Hockey equipment is available.
Nice of you to offer this. Good Karma to you.   Art
Thanks Wormdunker. It was very nice of you. The grandkids of the fella who picked them up will be very happy. They are my 4 best friend neighbours. They keep me smiling along with my 4 yr old.
